middle.title: Intermediate computer skills
middle.level: Typescript, Express, Remix.run, Craftmanship, Docker, Meteor, MongoDB, MySQL, Agile, Git

problem_solving.title: Ability to solve problems
problem_solving.level: Able to find effective solutions to problems that arise, allowing to work independently and make decisions quickly.

leadership.title: Sense of leadership
leadership.level: Able to lead in a difficult situation for the well-being of all.

pedagogy.title: Pedagogy
pedagogy.level: Able to clearly teach technical principles to facilitate understanding and reinforce knowledge in both others and self.

college.title: Fontaine des Eaux High School, Dinan, FRANCE, from September 2012 to July 2015
college.level: Baccalaureate diploma, specialty science and technology and sustainable development

university.title: School 42, Paris, FRANCE, from November 2015 to August 2017
university.level: Intensive and autonomous training in software development, with intensive learning of C and PHP

items.title: Eboueur, Community of communes of Plancoët, Plancoët, FRANCE, July 2014 & July 2015
value: As a garbage collector for the community of communes of Plancoët, I was responsible for the collection and treatment of household waste. I loaded the bins into the truck and took part in unloading them into the incinerator pit, while respecting safety standards.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, MeilleurSCPI, Paris, FRANCE, from August 2017 to May 2018
value: At MeilleureSCPI, I was able to enter the workforce as an intern and then start as a first hire. I had the opportunity to work on an investment portfolio management platform in SCPI as well as web scraping projects.
I worked in PHP with a legacy framework and in Vue.js 2, and I was able to learn Bootstrap and teamwork with Git.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, Solicis, Angoulême, FRANCE, from May 2018 to August 2018
value: Deepening of knowledge in PHP to integrate a showcase site for a house selling agency, use of the Zend framework.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, Monbuilding, Paris, FRANCE, from August 2018 to October 2018
value: Discovery of Meteor.js and ReactJS, immersion in the world of Node.js and real-time applications.

This experience has been important for me as it allowed me to discover a new framework and work in a dynamic and international environment. I have developed a particular interest in Node.js and reactive applications.

items.title: C# software developer, Ededoc, Angoulême, FRANCE, from November 2018 to July 2020
value: Learning C# code for the development of a virtual printer application, creation of an email delivery traceability system, integration of the electronic signature of documents in the printer workflow, development in JavaScript of a scrapping system to recover invoices.

items.title: Fullstack Developer, F.ASS.T, Angoulême, FRANCE, from July 2020 to now
value: Development of a Full-stack Node.js platform using React.js and GraphQL for insurers, development of backend services using JavaScript and TypeScript connected to a MongoDB database. I was integrated into the project architecture team as a Tech Lead in order to standardize project design and architectures before transitioning to an architect position in early 2023 to have a greater impact on the company's overall architecture.
I also had the opportunity to demonstrate my security skills by identifying critical points in applications.
I contributed to the company's growth from a start-up of 8 people to a team of over 50 and played a role in improving work methods within the company as well as in the training of new employees.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.value: I like to play video games, I am passionate about coding, I do fitness, and currently I am particularly interested in blockchain technology.
